member.name: M:PizzeriaCleacCodeIths.Controllers.OrdersController.Index
member.summary: Returns a list of non-approved orders in the system

member.name: M:PizzeriaCleacCodeIths.Controllers.OrdersController.Create(PizzeriaCleacCodeIths.Models.OrderRequestModel)
member.summary: Creates a new order in the system. Only accepts Items from the menu, the menu is: Pizzas: margarita,hawaii,kebabpizza,cuatrostagioni. Drinks:cocacola,fanta,sprite. Extra Ingredientsskinka,ananas,champinjoner,lök,kebabsås,räkor,musslor,kronärtskocka,kebab,koriander.

member.name: M:PizzeriaCleacCodeIths.Controllers.OrdersController.Edit(System.Guid,PizzeriaCleacCodeIths.Models.OrderRequestModel,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Modifies an exisiting order in the system. If the order status of the order is to be changed leave pizzas, drinks and extra ingredients blank.

member.name: M:PizzeriaCleacCodeIths.Controllers.OrdersController.Delete(System.Guid)
member.summary: Deletes an order from the system.
